body:
All submissions for this problem are available.

Read problems statements in Mandarin Chinese and Russian.

As we all know, Binomial Coefficient C(n, r) is defined by the
following formula.

Also define S(n) as follows.


Note that n will be provided to you as an input parameter.

Since S(n) can be very large, please print it modulo (109 + 7).

Input

  • The first line contains a single integer T representing the number of test cases.
  • Each of the next T lines contains an integer n.

Output

  • For each test case, output a single line containing the value of S(n) modulo (109 + 7).

Constraints

10 points:

  • 1 ≤ T ≤ 300
  • 1 ≤ n ≤ 300

    • 30 points:

  • 1 ≤ T ≤ 105
  • 1 ≤ n ≤ 5000

    • 60 points:

  • 1 ≤ T ≤ 105
  • 1 ≤ n ≤ 1018

    • Example

    Input:
5
1
2
3
4
5

Output:
2
4
2
4
8
languages_supported: ADA, ASM, BASH, BF, C, C99 strict, CAML, CLOJ, CLPS, CPP 4.3.2, CPP 4.9.2, CPP14, CS2, D, ERL, FORT, FS, GO, HASK, ICK, ICON, JAVA, JS, LISP clisp, LISP sbcl, LUA, NEM, NICE, NODEJS, PAS fpc, PAS gpc, PERL, PERL6, PHP, PIKE, PRLG, PYTH, PYTH 3.4, RUBY, SCALA, SCM guile, SCM qobi, ST, TCL, TEXT, WSPC
